CMP-lzpt-P-PROJ2-INSG-KEY.name: cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-inSG
CMP-lzpt-P-PROJ2-INSG-KEY.description: Production environment, Project 2, Infrastructure SG layer

CMP-lzpt-PP-PROJ2-INSG-KEY.name: cmp-lzpt-pp-proj2-inSG
CMP-lzpt-PP-PROJ2-INSG-KEY.description: Preproduction environment, Project 2, Infrastructure SG layer

GRP-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-INSG-ADMINS.name: grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins
GRP-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-INSG-ADMINS.description: Production environment, Project 2, Infrastructure SG Administrators

GRP-lzpt-PREPROD-PROJ2-INSG-ADMINS.name: grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-inSG-admins
GRP-lzpt-PREPROD-PROJ2-INSG-ADMINS.description: Preproduction environment, Project 2, Infrastructure SG Administrators

pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-GENERIC.name: pcy1-lzpt-prod-proj2-generic
pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-GENERIC.description: Generic access for Project 2 to shared network and security compartments
statements: allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins to use virtual-network-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-network
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins to manage private-ips in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-network
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins to read ons-topics in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-security
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-admins, grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins to use vaults in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-security

pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-APP-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy1-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-administration
pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-APP-ADMINISTRATION.description: Allows Project 2 App Admins to manage App layer resources
statements: allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins to manage instance-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-app
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins to manage object-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-app
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-app-admins to manage logging-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-app

pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-DB-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy1-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-administration
pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-DB-ADMINISTRATION.description: Allows Project 2 DB Admins to manage DB layer resources
statements: allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-admins to manage database-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-db
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-db-admins to manage logging-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-db

pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-INSG-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy1-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-administration
pcy1-lzpt-PROD-PROJ2-INSG-ADMINISTRATION.description: Allows Project 2 Infra SG Admins to manage infra-layer resources
statements: allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins to manage instance-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-inSG
allow group grp-lzpt-prod-proj2-inSG-admins to manage logging-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-p-projects:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2:cmp-lzpt-p-proj2-inSG

pcy1-lzpt-PREPROD-PROJ2-GENERIC.name: pcy1-lzpt-preprod-proj2-generic
pcy1-lzpt-PREPROD-PROJ2-GENERIC.description: Generic access for Project 2 to shared network and security compartments (Preprod)
statements: allow group grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-app-admins, grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-db-admins, grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-inSG-admins to use virtual-network-family in compartment cmp-lzpt-pp-network
allow group grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-app-admins, grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-db-admins, grp-lzpt-preprod-proj2-inSG-admins to use vaults in compartment cmp-lzpt-pp-security
